Package it.polimi.ingsw.ui.cli.controller

Class UserInputController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.ui.cli.controller.UserInputController
public class UserInputController
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used by the Cli to send the input that the client insert to the server, it receives a command and translate it in a network message to pass to the ClientMessageListener to send to the server.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private NetMap gameMap  
    private CliGame gameView  
    private ClientMessageListener listener  
    private java.lang.String playerName  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    UserInputController​(ClientMessageListener listener)
    It creates a user input controller with the given listener ad argument.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void connect​(java.lang.String playerName, java.lang.String serverAddress)
    It tries to connect to the game server with the specified nickname.
    void disconnect()
    It disconnects the user.
    void getCommand​(int num)
    It sends to the server the wanted dimension for the lobby because the player is the first player of the game.
    void getCommand​(Command command, Turn turn)
    This method builds a network message from the command given by the users and uses the listener to send it invoking its methods, it is called only from lobby to the next phases of the game and it consider the command given correct because controlled by the caller.
    void getCommand​(Command command, Turn turn, NetBuild build)
    This method builds a network message of build from the given command.
    void getCommand​(Command command, Turn turn, NetMove move)
    This method builds a network message of move from the given command.
    void setGameView​(CliGame view)
    Sets the game view where to get commands.
    void setMap​(NetMap map)
    Sets the current map.
    void setPlayerName​(java.lang.String name)
    Sets the name of the player.
    void tryAnotherName​(java.lang.String name)
    It sends another message to the server trying to gain this other name because the previous wasn't possible to use.

    • UserInputController

      public UserInputController​(ClientMessageListener listener)
      It creates a user input controller with the given listener ad argument.
      Parameters:
      listener - a ClientMessageListener

  • Method Details

    • setMap

      public void setMap​(NetMap map)
      Sets the current map.
      Parameters:
      map - a NetMap

    • setPlayerName

      public void setPlayerName​(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name of the player.
      Parameters:
      name - the player's name

    • setGameView

      public void setGameView​(CliGame view)
      Sets the game view where to get commands.
      Parameters:
      view - a CliGame

    • getCommand

      public void getCommand​(Command command, Turn turn) throws java.lang.IllegalStateException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      This method builds a network message from the command given by the users and uses the listener to send it invoking its methods, it is called only from lobby to the next phases of the game and it consider the command given correct because controlled by the caller.
      Parameters:
      command - the command inserted by the client
      turn - the current phase of the game
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - when it is called with a phase that isn't a message of the phase considered
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • getCommand

      public void getCommand​(Command command, Turn turn, NetMove move) throws java.lang.IllegalStateException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      This method builds a network message of move from the given command.
      Parameters:
      command - the command inserted by the client
      turn - the current phase of the game
      move - the NetMove that the player wants to perform
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the phase is wrong of if it isn't the player's turn
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the command is wrong or if the parameter is not well formed

    • getCommand

      public void getCommand​(Command command, Turn turn, NetBuild build) throws java.lang.IllegalStateException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      This method builds a network message of build from the given command.
      Parameters:
      command - the command inserted by the client
      turn - the current phase of the game
      build - the NetBuild that the player wants to perform
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the phase is wrong of if it isn't the player's turn
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the command is wrong or if the parameter is null

    • getCommand

      public void getCommand​(int num) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      It sends to the server the wanted dimension for the lobby because the player is the first player of the game.
      Parameters:
      num - an integer representing the number of players of the lobby
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if num isn't 2 or 3

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      It disconnects the user.

    • connect

      public void connect​(java.lang.String playerName, java.lang.String serverAddress) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      It tries to connect to the game server with the specified nickname.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the player's name
      serverAddress - the server's address
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is playerName or serverAddress is null

    • tryAnotherName

      public void tryAnotherName​(java.lang.String name) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.IllegalStateException
      It sends another message to the server trying to gain this other name because the previous wasn't possible to use.
      Parameters:
      name - new player's name
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name is null
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the message listener thinks the player doesn't want to play
